name: Opera
description: Opera is a web browser characterized with network sync, password management, session management, mouse gestures, keyboard shortcuts, built-in search engine, intelligent pop-up ad blocking, URL filtering and theme skin, plug-in extension and other functions.

changelog.38.0.2220.42:
1. Hovering bookmark below Menu crashes Opera
2. [SP] Quick clicking side panel items fails to work
3. Bold text in address bar suggestions is wrongly displayed
4. Certain pages never load completely when AdBlocker is on
5. The silent mode – fall back to Current User installation.
6. Youtube history again not being filled if ad-blocker is enabled
7. [Engine] Problems with autocomplete when typing www
8. Adblock + speedtest.net = blank page
9. YouTube shows ‘fullscreen unavailable’ message if DPI is > 100%

en_US.description: Opera is a web browser characterized with network sync, password management, session management, mouse gestures, keyboard shortcuts, built-in search engine, intelligent pop-up ad blocking, URL filtering and theme skin, plug-in extension and other functions.
en_US.name: Opera

changelog.38.0.2220.42:
1. 修复书签悬停菜单下面崩溃的问题
2. 修复点击快速侧面板项目无法工作的问题
3. 修复在地址栏中建议粗体文本显示错误的问题
4. 修复当AdBlocker开启时，某些页面不会完全加载的问题
5. 静音模式 - 回落到当前用户安装。
6. 如果启用了广告拦截，YouTube纪录将未被填补
7. 修复输入www时，未自动填充的问题
8. Adblock的+ speedtest.net=空白页
9. 如果DPI消息> 100％,YouTube上显示“全屏不可用”

zh_CN.description: Opera是一款网络浏览器，它具有网络同步，密码管理、会话管理、鼠标手势、键盘快捷键、内置搜索引擎、智能弹出式广告拦截、网址的过滤和主题皮肤、插件扩展等功能。
zh_CN.name: Opera
